pde.description: Manufactured divergence-free flow from stream function sin(2*pi*x)*sin(pi*y) (tests anisotropic wavelengths)
Manufactured divergence-free flow from stream function sin(pi*x)*sin(2*pi*y) (tests anisotropic wavelengths)
High viscosity manufactured flow (diffusion-dominated; sanity check for nonlinear solver)
Very low viscosity with small-amplitude manufactured flow (keeps Newton stable while testing high-Re regime)
Manufactured flow with exponential stream function (tests strongly nonuniform gradients)
Boundary-layer-like manufactured flow (sharp gradients near x=1 via exp(6*(x-1)))
Multi-scale manufactured flow from stream function (divergence-free by construction; uses rational coefficients to satisfy sympy equals(0))
Polynomial manufactured stream function psi=x*(1-x)*y*(1-y) (smooth, zero velocity on boundary)
Shear-layer-like manufactured flow from psi=tanh(6*(y-0.5))*sin(pi*x) (tests sharp interior gradients)
Multi-scale manufactured flow on quadrilateral mesh from a stream function (divergence-free by construction)
Higher-order Taylor-Hood (P4/P3) on a small mesh (tests p-refinement under nonlinearity)
No-exact: lid-driven cavity Navier-Stokes (tests corner singularities / boundary layers)
No-exact: channel inflow with natural outflow boundary (tests open boundary handling under nonlinearity)
Manufactured localized vortex from Gaussian stream function (tests localized gradients and nonlinear balance)
Manufactured two-vortex flow from superposed Gaussian stream functions (tests multi-scale localized structure)
Manufactured shear-layer flow from psi=tanh(6*(x-0.5))*sin(pi*y) (tests sharp gradients and conditioning)
Manufactured divergence-free flow from psi=sin(3*pi*x)*sin(2*pi*y) (tests higher-mode nonlinearity)
Manufactured polynomial stream function with stronger interior variation (tests low-regularity vs discretization)
No-exact: cavity with two moving lids (top and right) (tests competing shear layers under nonlinearity)
No-exact: counter-shear from top/bottom walls with open left/right (tests shear-driven flow with natural outflow)
No-exact: swirl-like inflow profile with natural outflow (tests coupled velocity components under nonlinearity)
No-exact: constant body force with open left boundary and walls elsewhere (tests pressure-driven-like flow under mixed BC)
Helmholtz with smooth manufactured solution; moderate k

Steady nonlinear reaction-diffusion with cubic reaction, manufactured small-amplitude solution
Steady Allen-Cahn type reaction-diffusion, manufactured smooth solution
Steady Fisher-KPP/logistic reaction-diffusion, manufactured bounded solution

No-exact: Allen-Cahn with localized Gaussian source (tests localized forcing under nonlinear reaction)
No-exact: logistic reaction with two Gaussian sources (tests multi-source interaction)
No-exact: cubic reaction with oscillatory source (tests stiffness + nonlinearity)
Steady linear reaction-diffusion with decay (alpha<0), manufactured smooth solution
Steady linear reaction-diffusion, manufactured boundary-layer-like gradients
Steady linear reaction-diffusion, manufactured multi-frequency solution (multiscale)
Steady Allen-Cahn with stronger reaction (larger lambda), manufactured bounded solution
Steady logistic (Fisher-KPP) with higher rho, manufactured bounded solution
Steady cubic reaction with softening (beta<0), manufactured small-amplitude solution
Transient linear reaction-diffusion, manufactured time-dependent solution
Transient Allen-Cahn, manufactured time-dependent solution
No-exact: Allen-Cahn with smooth sign-changing source (global coupling)
No-exact: logistic reaction with localized sink/source competition

No-exact: linear reaction-diffusion with multifrequency forcing (tests multiscale source)
